Paragraph: Partizan Belgrade ( Yugoslavia ) 9 5 4 14

2. Yugoslavia: This is a proper noun referring to a country that existed in Europe from 1929 to 2006. Therefore, "Yugoslavia" can also be identified as a location entity in this paragraph.
